scripts.keys: snarkjs groth16 setup ./outputs/transfer/transfer.r1cs ./setups/powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau ./outputs/transfer/transfer.zkey ; snarkjs zkey export verificationkey ./outputs/transfer/transfer.zkey ./outputs/transfer/transferVKey.json ;  snarkjs groth16 setup ./outputs/predictableUpdate/predictableUpdate.r1cs ./setups/powersOfTau28_hez_final_16.ptau ./outputs/predictableUpdate/predictableUpdate.zkey ; snarkjs zkey export verificationkey ./outputs/predictableUpdate/predictableUpdate.zkey ./outputs/predictableUpdate/predictableUpdateVKey.json
scripts.solgen: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier ./outputs/transfer/transfer.zkey ./verifiers/transferVerifier.sol ; snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier ./outputs/predictableUpdate/predictableUpdate.zkey ./verifiers/predictableUpdateVerifier.sol
